structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

law.text: An action for seduction may be maintained without any allegation or proof of the loss of service of the victim by reason of the wrongful act of the defendant.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 105. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2.
